head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHEINES, RITA SOLOMON

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHEINES, RITA SOLOMON

block.p: SCHEINES--Rita Solomon, 78, wife of Joseph Scheines for 57 years, died January 15, after a short illness. Mother of Dan Scheines and Lisa and Peter Horton, and grandmother of Alex and Jess Horton, and Thalia and Dorothy Scheines. Queens College grad worked in human resources at H-P. In lieu of flowers, contributions to NAMI are welcome.
